Your account balance is due in next three days. Your account will be charged on due date. To prevent any lost of service or additional charges ($15 reactivation fee), please make sure your payment are on time.

B•Vision is hosted on our BTVi. It is legal as long as you use it as intended. Like your home computer, you have access to media content via the Internet. Much of the content available do require it\'s own license agreements. BTVi is a mini-super computer. BTVi operates as an Internet search engine like Google, Bing, Yahoo, etc. The videos are streamed directly from third-party video sharing services. BTVi supports the protection of intellectual property. BTVi and B•Vision are not responsible for third party copyright infringement. All other trademarks, logos, and images are the property of their respective and rightful owners.

At Legacy Direct, Data privacy and security is a top priority. We collect only the minimum amount of information necessary to help improve our advertisement, products and services. The data that we collect may include information about your device, location, email, application, and browsing habits. This applies to all Apps you have installed or may install. We do not share sensitive information. The data we collect may be shared within our group and with select business partners, including those based outside United States jurisdiction. The data privacy regulation that apply in countries outside United states jurisdiction may not offer the same level of protection. See our Privacy Policy at http://legacy.direct/privacy_policy.html \n
By selecting “OK” below, you affirm that you are over 18 years of age and consent to the collection of data to help improve our advertisement, products and services.

Thank you for purchasing your BTVi3. At Legacy Direct, we strive to provide you with the latest streaming technology. From time to time we release updates to improve our products and services. To start your streaming adventure please go to the home screen and click on Product Manual for guides on our products and customer service. Happy Streaming!
